title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 26 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 26 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Woke Olympic ratings are tanking. US men's basketball loses to France. France! Why do they need to wear masks for the Olympic medal ceremonies?! They just competed without masks! This covid insanity is never going to end. Sports has become as radicalized and as woke as Hollywood. How can athletes regain the trust of viewers? Callers share their thoughts on woke Olympics athletes. NFL has vaccinated and unvaccinated players wearing different colored wrist bands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
